name: PRE - S - First Fix - Plumbing
Hot water supply lines run the shortest
Specified Waste pipework is Acoustic lagged and acceptable
Penetrations through fire cells are fire protected
All joist Brackets or Reinforcement installed, if required
Nog's and fixings are installed for water closet, shower, hot water cylinder and etc.
Penetrations through building paper are trade sealed
Hot Water Ring main is thermally lagged
All Pipework clipped neatly and tidy
All pipework secured/ siliconed
Floor Waste Gully Flange is recessed into flooring and installed
Enter water pressure value tested for. Confirm loop not effect lining
Checked for drips on water and waste piping
Soil and waste piping hydrostatic test ( Flood test )
Test plug & Gauge removed from pipe system
Fire penetration Schedule is completed
Flange and all through installed pipework flood tested
Plumbing First Fix complete and acceptable and area clean and tidy for next trade
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
POST - S - Second Fix - Plumbing
Preinstall QA
Permission to begin work obtained
Drawings correct issue and construction set
Area is left clean and tidy and work can begin
Fit-off materials match schedule or drawings
Setouts/min clearances as per specification
Water pipework maintained test throughout
No debris in floor wastes or subs
Water Supplies
Toilet full flush and half flush working as required. Visual check for leaks on pan cone and close coupled connection
Vanity basin mixer working to required flow rate and overflow able to keep up with flow rate from mixer
Sink overflow able to keep up with flow rate from mixer
Dishwasher commissioned
Showers  - Mixer working to required flow rate and shower hoses fitted with non-returns
Hot water cylinder
Trap installed on tray if required
HWC relief lines have 25mm clearance
Restraints installed
Hot water set to Min 60°
Tempering valve set to required temperature
Timber blocks installed
Finishing
Flanges installed on all pipework penetrations
All soil pipes are connected to  sanitary sewer
No crossovers, hot on left and cold on right on all mixers
All fixtures are siliconed down and splash sealed
Hose taps are complete with Vacuum Breakers
Area is left clean and tidy
Work is 100% competed to required specifications
Raise remedial/Request signoff
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
